abilities.name: Mortar
about: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes

abilities.name: Gas Mortar
about: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes
Pulls existing or newly created orbs back to the encounter damaging anything in it's path

abilities.name: Ground Slam
about: Slams the ground, creating wave that travel forwards and damage enemies

abilities.name: Enraged Gas Mortar
about: Increases movement speed, damage, attack and cast speed
Slams the ground, creating a wave of broken ground that damages enemies in an area in front of player

abilities.name: Reflection
about: Shoots a burning beam that reflects when it's connected with a wall

abilities.name: Melee Combo
about: Strikes enemy foes down with a powerful blow
